attributes.action: reject calls for a change to the oath of loyalty to the Queen sworn by MPs, judges and other servants of the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The pressure group, Republic, is attempting to undermine the constitutional role of the monarchy by removing mention of Her Majesty from the oath of loyalty sworn by various public figures.

It is important that we resist such attempts and show ourselves to be a people at ease with and, indeed, supportive of our monarchy.
